EmailTemplate.name: Dealer Referral LRU
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}; CASE- {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
The part number you have requested is a BendixKing LRU which can only be purchased directly by an authorized distributor.
If you'd like to purchase this part, please contact a BendixKing dealer who will work with a distributor on your behalf. Your nearest BendixKing dealer can be found here:
Dealer Search: https://bendixking.com/en/pages/find-a-dealer
Thank you,
BendixKing Customer Support
{!EmailMessage.TextBody}
